alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:07PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ST. JOHNS AND NORTHEASTERN CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 507 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Green Cove Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, Picolata, Switzerland, Penney Farms, and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
